name: GainsboroughForte
0:
”Alexa, unlock the door lock.”
”Alexa,unlock my door lock”
”Alexa,lock my door lock”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the Forte skill you can use Alexa to control two Forte smart lock models, both require a Forte Wi-Fi Bridge (BZ100).
 
With this Alexa skill, you can check the status of your lock and lock/unlock it using voice control. To unlock your smark lock with a voice command, you will need to tell Alexa a four-digit PIN that you create with the Alexa app.
